title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 204.7 - Research
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 204.7 - Research

State Regulations

The commissioner is hereby authorized to contract with the
advice of the advisory board any person or persons, such as the New York State

College of Agriculture and Life Science to carry on or cause to be carried on
apple production, harvesting, storage and marketing quality research, and to
expend any available monies for such purpose and pursuant to this
order. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
204.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
